thread.title: Dow falls 400 points in broad market sell-off

title: Dow falls 400 points in broad market sell-off
text:
Dow plunges 500 points 12:57am IST - 01:50 
Stock investors were spooked by the combination of fears a solid job growth could lead to a faster rise in interest rates, the release of a controversial memo in Washington could lead to political turmoil, and disappointments from Apple and Google parent Alphabet.   
Stock investors were spooked by the combination of fears a solid job growth could lead to a faster rise in interest rates, the release of a controversial memo in Washington could lead to political turmoil, and disappointments from Apple and Google parent Alphabet.  //reut.rs/2nBTpgV
